criticalIssues.title: Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
criticalIssues.description: Users can register with admin role
criticalIssues.expected: Role should be restricted to user/vendor
criticalIssues.actual: Admin role assigned to new user
criticalIssues.suggestedFix: Validate and restrict role assignment in registration

security.title: Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
security.description: Users can register with admin role

security.suggestedFix: Validate and restrict role assignment in registration

accessibility.title: Missing Semantic HTML - Checkout.tsx
accessibility.expected: Use of header, nav, main, section, article elements
accessibility.suggestedFix: Replace divs with appropriate semantic HTML elements

accessibility.title: Missing Semantic HTML - CompleteSetup.tsx
accessibility.expected: Use of header, nav, main, section, article elements
accessibility.suggestedFix: Replace divs with appropriate semantic HTML elements

accessibility.title: Limited Keyboard Navigation Support
accessibility.description: Components may not support keyboard navigation
accessibility.expected: Proper keyboard navigation and focus management
accessibility.suggestedFix: Implement proper focus management and keyboard event handlers

Implement proper error handling and user feedback mechanisms
